overview: In the middle of winter, Hernán Talavera was sent to a small village, where he would have to remain until summer. And Marta, who had just left Latvia to continue her year-long relationship with Hernán, would have to live alone in a strange country. Before leaving, Hernán promised to make something to compensate for his absence: this film. Like an inventory of tiny daily events, CANCIÓN EN LA NOCHE celebrates the simple life, small things and the passing of time.
title: Canción en la noche
